# htmldf

From a vector of urls, `htmldf::html_df()` will attempt to fetch the html, page title, language, image urls and social tags returning the result as a dataframe.

To install the package:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github('alastairrushworth/htmldf)
```

To get summaries of two webpages:
```{r}
library(htmldf)
urlx <- c("https://ropensci.org/blog/2020/02/21/ropensci-leadership/",
           "https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_en_espa%C3%B1ol")
html_df(urlx)
```
